PackageOracle.name: DA_BUS_INTER_VANTAGE_ORD_XREF
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_BUS_INTER_VANTAGE_ORD_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.43.643638000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ord_no IN VARCHAR2
,bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ord_no IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref;

body.name: DA_BUS_INTER_VANTAGE_ORD_XREF
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BUS_INTER_VANTAGE_ORD_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.43.653521000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ord_no IN VARCHAR2
,bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref.add, parms=' || ord_no || '|' || bus_interact_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref a
(
a.ord_no
,a.bus_interact_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.ord_no
,add.bus_interact_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ord_no IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref.del, parms=' || ord_no || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.ord_no = del.ord_no
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref.del');

END del;

END da_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref;
